A figure bursted from the forest in a heavy run when suddly lasers 
started to burst out behind him.  blade ran with all his might as the 
3 maximals started to close in on him a large Hawk swoped down on 
Blade but was smacked away from his large scorpian tail, Blade jumped 
down a low cliff and hit the ground with a thud before getting back 
to his feet.  a White Wolf and Black Panther jumped high over the 
cliff and landed softly were blade did without even stopping as they 
quickly ran after Blade

Blade looked behind him to see Stalker and Pantra gaining on him, so 
his quickly rised his right hand as black mist formed around them and 
turned into a solid saber a crison red beam shot out and formed a 
sword and Blade started to slice trees making them fall behind him 
trying to slow Stalker and Pantra down
